title: Week in Politics: Congress Focuses On ISIS Strategy Ahead Of Recess
teaser: With a recess coming up at the end for the week, members of Congress have a short amount of time tackle major issues.
contentencoded:
Members of Congress are due to start recess at the end of the week, heading home ahead of the November midterm elections, but they have a lot to do before then.

NPR’s Ron Elving tells Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson and Robin Young where the conversation stands on ISIS in the House and Senate, and what may or may not get done before members leave Washington at the end of the week.

Guest

  • Ron Elving, senior Washington editor for NPR. He tweets @relving
